name: Kleebuu Craves Fruit Salad
description:
Explore your warped mind while solving platforming puzzles, in an tale that will unfold the deeper you get. Delve into the suppressed memories and remember how to leave this dream. Escape before the nightmares catch up... If you dream about fruit for long enough it's bound to turn rotten.

Eat fruit to solve fun platforming puzzles and escape your nightmares!

Exploring the dreams



Run and jump through a bright, fruit filled land. Eating fruit is key to traversing your mind, but it won't be easy with the challenges getting more complex the closer you get to remembering how to leave your dream.

Escaping the nightmares


Not all dreams are nice, fruit can turn rotten and you have to be careful in these dangerous zones. Something is not right about these areas and are best forgotten about.


Features "woof" button with 4 different honks!
